package.name: ebay-scraper
package.documentation-string: Tools for scraping eBay items and sellers into a MongoDB database. Source.

function-definition.name: scrape-items
function-definition.documentation-string: Scrapes a list of queries/items.

function-definition.name: seller-info
function-definition.documentation-string: Gets all of the information for a seller.

function-definition.name: scrape-item
function-definition.documentation-string: Scrapes a single query/item.

function-definition.name: set-db-name
function-definition.documentation-string: Sets the MongoDB database name.

function-definition.name: item-info
function-definition.documentation-string: Gets all of the item information for an item ID.

function-definition.name: afirst
function-definition.documentation-string: Helper function to get first element of an array.

function-definition.name: seller-get-feedback-score
function-definition.documentation-string: Gets the seller's feedback score.

function-definition.name: item-get-images
function-definition.documentation-string: Gets the images of the item. (at the largest resolution, l2000).

function-definition.name: search-query-to-url
function-definition.documentation-string: Gets the URL for a item list page for the given search query.

function-definition.name: item-get-about-this-item
function-definition.documentation-string: Gets specifics about this item ('Item specifics')

function-definition.name: seller-get-location
function-definition.documentation-string: Gets seller location.

function-definition.name: item-get-desc-iframe-text
function-definition.documentation-string: Gets description text (from first iframe in description, if any).

function-definition.name: item-get-item-location
function-definition.documentation-string: Gets item location.

variable-definition.name: *mut*
variable-definition.documentation-string: Synchronizes calls to cl-mongo CRUD operations.

function-definition.name: item-dom
function-definition.documentation-string: Gets the DOM for an item page for the item with the given id.

function-definition.name: item-get-condition-message
function-definition.documentation-string: Gets message about item condition.

function-definition.name: seller-get-feedback-ratings
function-definition.documentation-string: Gets seller's feedback ratings (stars for item as described, communication,shipping time, shipping charges).

function-definition.name: string-trim-collapse
function-definition.documentation-string: Helper function to trim extra spaces in text.

function-definition.name: alist-to-document
function-definition.documentation-string: Converts directly from association list to cl-mongo:document.

function-definition.name: item-get-name
function-definition.documentation-string: Gets item title.

function-definition.name: item-get-id
function-definition.documentation-string: Gets item id.

function-definition.name: seller-name-to-url
function-definition.documentation-string: Gets the URL for a seller.

function-definition.name: item-get-also-viewed
function-definition.documentation-string: Gets ids of other products commonly viewed alongside this item.

function-definition.name: scrape-all-pages
function-definition.documentation-string: Scrapes all pages of a search until no new results are returned.

function-definition.name: item-get-policies
function-definition.documentation-string: Gets shipping, return, and payment policy details.

function-definition.name: range
function-definition.documentation-string: Helper function to generate the range [lo,hi)https://stackoverflow.com/a/13937652/2397327

function-definition.name: item-get-desc-text
function-definition.documentation-string: Gets description text (not in iframe).

variable-definition.name: *item-url-base*
variable-definition.documentation-string: Base URL of an eBay item page.

function-definition.name: remove-non-text
function-definition.documentation-string: Remove comments, script, style tags from DOM.

function-definition.name: seller-get-creation-date
function-definition.documentation-string: Gets seller's creation date.

function-definition.name: scrape
function-definition.documentation-string: Get the parsed DOM for the given URL, or an error value if the pagedoesn't exist.

variable-definition.name: *item-list-base*
variable-definition.documentation-string: Base URL of an eBay item list page.

function-definition.name: seller-dom
function-definition.documentation-string: Gets the DOM for a seller.

function-definition.name: item-id-to-url
function-definition.documentation-string: Converts an eBay item ID to its URL.

function-definition.name: item-url-to-id
function-definition.documentation-string: Converts an eBay URL to its item ID.

function-definition.name: datestring-to-bson
function-definition.documentation-string: Converts a date string into

function-definition.name: filter-ebay-item-urls
function-definition.documentation-string: Filters out non-eBay-item pages from a list of URL's.

function-definition.name: item-get-itemprops
function-definition.documentation-string: Gets item properties (e.g., price, currency)

function-definition.name: item-get-ships-to-locations
function-definition.documentation-string: Gets item ships to/excludes shipping to locations.

variable-definition.name: *seller-url-base*
variable-definition.documentation-string: Base URL for sellers on eBay.

function-definition.name: scrape-remove-non-text
function-definition.documentation-string: Scrape and remove comments, script, style tags.

function-definition.name: print-doc
function-definition.documentation-string: Formats a document like a server reply so it can be printed withcl-mongo:pp.

function-definition.name: scrape-first-text
function-definition.documentation-string: Helper function to get (single) string if exists, or empty stringotherwise.

function-definition.name: seller-get-feedback-scores
function-definition.documentation-string: Gets the seller's distribution of feedback scores.

function-definition.name: item-get-seller-name
function-definition.documentation-string: Gets seller name.

function-definition.name: seller-get-name
function-definition.documentation-string: Gets the seller's name.

function-definition.name: seller-get-bio
function-definition.documentation-string: Gets the seller's bio.
